pageContent: Background: A recent randomized trial to compare external beam radiation therapy (EBRT) to cryoablation for localized disease showed cryoablation to be noninferior to external beam EBRT in disease progression and overall and disease-specific survival. We report on the quality of life (QOL) outcomes for this trial.

metaData.source:
Barriers to medical help-seeking among older men with prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28368770/
